content.raw:
The log files contain the necessary information. We don't output  to the command line by default because:

1. Constant messages get ignored over time. 
1. When running with ROS, which throws lots of garbage to the screen, Gazebo messages are lost in the noise.
1. As we move toward Windows and an icon-launchable application, console output is less useful.
content.html:
The log files contain the necessary information. We don't output to the command line by default because:

  1. Constant messages get ignored over time.
  2. When running with ROS, which throws lots of garbage to the screen, Gazebo messages are lost in the noise.
  3. As we move toward Windows and an icon-launchable application, console output is less useful.
